overview: In the recent years, Monta単ita - a beach town in Ecuador - has experienced a lot of exposure and growth. As is often the case, this development has brought a host of challenges that threaten to destroy the unique character of the town. So a question arises; As Monta単ita becomes big and successful, will it retain its special vibe? Or will its magic be broken?
title: Monta単ita: Beach Life
